content.title: Safai Karmakar Ke Bachche Hetu Chhatravrtti Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Safai Karmakar Ke Bachche Hetu Chhatravrtti Yojana' for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015. The main objective of the scheme to provides financial assistance to the children of sanitation workers in India for higher education.
benefits: Financial assistance provided according to the below table
Classes I to V: ₹ 1,000/- for boys, ₹ 1,500/- for girls
Classes VI to VIII: ₹ 1,500/- for boys, ₹ 2,000/- for girls
Classes IX to XII: ₹ 2,000/- for boys, ₹ 3,000/- for girls
Pursuing graduate level professional course: ₹ 10,000/- for boys, ₹ 11,000/- for girls
Studying for professional level, doing PhD or research work: ₹ 14,000/- for boys, ₹ 15,000/- for girls
eligibility: Only 2 sons/daughters of registered sanitation workers are eligible for the scholarship.
The scholarship is provided for studying different courses.

After admission in college/polytechnic or other course for engineering or medical education, the students receiving scholarship amount under this scheme must study for a minimum of one year in that course.
If such a student is eligible to receive scholarship amount under any scheme of any other government department/institution, then he/she can choose any one scheme which is beneficial for him/her.
The student cannot avail benefits of two schemes simultaneously.
documents_required: Mark certificate of previous year exam

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Safai Karmakar Ke Bachche Hetu Chhatravrtti Yojana' for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to the children of sanitation workers in India for higher education.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: How many children of a parent will be eligible for the benefits?
faqs.answer: Only 2 sons/daughters of registered sanitation workers are eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: Can applicants get the benefits of a parallel scheme from the state government?
faqs.answer: Applicants must not be receiving any other parallel scheme of the state government.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then can applicants apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicants register under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'?
faqs.answer: All applicants have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department, click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board', enter the required details, check eligibility criteria, fill out the registration form, and submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All applicants have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department, click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board', provide the required details, fill out the application form, and submit.
